definition: to compound (medicines etc)/to prepare (by mixing ingredients)/to concoct
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: The confection of the nutritious liquid is a important technical problem in the hydroponics .
sentences.chinese: 营养液配制是无土栽培一个关键的技术问题。

sentences.english: The regulations also ban unregulated health practitioners from commissioning or formulating their own medicines.
sentences.chinese: 法规还严禁不合格的中医医生从业或配制自己的药方。

sentences.english: The preparation of beverages such as betel nut, to prevent the occurrence of severe malaria disease.
sentences.chinese: 如用槟榔配制饮料，可预防瘴气重而发生的疾病。

sentences.english: Lime water may be bought at any druggist's, or easily prepared at home.
sentences.chinese: 石灰水可从药店购得，不过在家里配制也很容易。

sentences.english: Kava is also the name of the pungent beverage prepared from the plant's roots.

sentences.english: After washing the feeding and preparation equipment, rinse thoroughly in safe water.
sentences.chinese: 在清洗喂养和配制器具后，再用安全饮水彻底冲洗。

sentences.english: Stock standard solutions are used to prepare primary dilution standards.

sentences.english: The total floating wage system for the staff is a great development of the income and allocation system.

sentences.english: Introduced the preparation of color glaze used in unglazed ware altering to green body.

sentences.english: One of the coolest things about 4Food is the ability to save the burgers you’ve made to the food system.
sentences.chinese: 它最酷的功能之一是把你个人配制的汉堡存入系统。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a method of preparing and using a new room-temperature quick phosphating solution.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种新型常温快速磷化液的配制和使用方法。

sentences.english: Post allowance system (PAS) is an innovation method of distribution system in college and university.

sentences.english: We will reform the income distribution system.
Several lower alkalinity and small addition concrete expansion agents were prepared with different raw materials.

sentences.english: The research supplied theoretical way to confect electrostatic spraying preparation.
sentences.chinese: 这些规律为以后静电喷雾制剂的配制提供了理论依据。

definition: to concoct by mixing ingredients/to prepare according to a recipe/to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)
prescription/cooking recipe/formulation/completing the square (to solve quadratic equation, math.)
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
